trans-unit.source: Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.

This class is not intended for public use and is used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly typed client-side objects for communicating with data services.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Design.EntityClassGenerator"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Design.EntityClassGenerator"></xref> class.
Selects the programming language.
Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EdmToObjectNamespaceMap" name="EdmToObjectNamespaceMap" href=""></xref> object used in entity class generation.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_EdmToObjectNamespaceMap" name="EdmToObjectNamespaceMap" href=""></xref> object.
Generates code for the object model.
The XML reader object.
The string that contains the path to the target file.
The list of schema errors that occurred during generation.
Generates code for the data model from switches identified by parameters.
The `namespacePrefix` is used as the only namespace for types in the same namespace as the default container, or as a prefix for the server-provided namespace in all other cases.
If `namespacePrefix` is `null`, the server-provided namespaces are used for all types.
The XML reader object.
The text writer object.
The string that contains the namespace prefix.
The list of schema errors that occurred during generation.
Gets the language option used in generation of the data model.
Language option.
Occurs when a property is generated.
To be added.
Occurs when a type is generated.
To be added.
Gets or sets whether code generation should include the code that is required to support data binding.

A <xref:System.Boolean> value that is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when data binding code is required; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets and sets the version of [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] that the generated code targets.
A <xref href="System.Data.Services.Design.DataServiceCodeVersion"></xref> value that indicates the version of the generated code.
